Summary: i thought it was a plane on fire until it got closer
divs: Sighting Detailsi was workin gettin supplies from the truck with co workers.i turned my head and saw a realy bright light.when i focused on it my first thought was it looked like a plane on fire.it stayed on the same path and when it passed us it looked like it was almost going up. almost straight up. i didnt know what to think.i said to my co workers what is that and we all looked.after a couple of seconds i knew it wasnt a plane or a comet. i got kinda excited that i saw the object with 3 other people at the same time.my co worker did take a cell phone vid with with our reactions.all that you can see on the vidio is a small dot.i lost sight when it seemed like it was going up.like it wasnt moveing forward as much as it was going up.it wasnt moving fast at all.no weird movement except that it was lower and went higher with no sound.
